text:
It's no secret America has a gun problem – turn on the TV or open a newspaper for proof of that.

But there's more to learn about where the guns come from.

I'm working on a bill to require an annual report on gun trafficking.

Attacking trafficking is another way to save lives.
label: D

text:
On Yom HaShoah, we remember the horrors of the Holocaust.

We pray for the six million Jews and millions of others murdered by the Nazis and for the families devastated by one of history's greatest atrocities.

And we rededicate ourselves to a simple, sacred promise: Never again.
label: D

text:
Here's my take on the world’s richest man buying Twitter:

He makes a great car and rocket.

But I’m concerned his personal views will stop the fight against disinformation on social media.

The problem on Twitter hasn't been too much content moderation – it's too much hate.
label: D

text:
Everyone deserves quality health care.

That's why I'm an original cosponsor of the Health Equity and Accountability Act, which includes large parts of my bills to root out biases and expand access to lifesaving care.

Let's make our health care system work for everyone.
label: D

text:
There aren’t any rules in Donald Trump's GOP.

Caught in a lie? That's fine.
Advocating for a coup? Also fine.
Violating your oath of office? Commonplace.

Telling the truth, on the other hand - that’s a disqualifying offense.
label: D

text:
I'm glad @POTUS delivered an additional $800 million in aid to support Ukraine.

With each passing day, Putin escalates the cruelty of his assault.

So we must ensure our support for the Ukrainian people remains ironclad and ongoing.

We will not waver.
label: D

text:
One hundred and seven years ago, the Ottoman Empire began a systematic effort to destroy the Armenian people.

Yet, through every horror, the Armenian people persevered.

So today on this solemn anniversary we speak with one voice:

We will not forget. We will never forget.
label: D

text:
As the celebration of Passover comes to an end, I want to extend my best wishes to the Jewish community.

I hope you ate plenty of matzo balls and matzo brei – and that you and your loved ones enjoyed a meaningful holiday (and now your return to leavened bread).

Chag Sameach!
label: D

text:
There's no sugar-coating it: The climate crisis is here – and our planet is in trouble.

But it's not too late to act.

This Earth Day, let's recommit to pulling out all the stops to protect our planet from this existential threat.

Nothing short of a policy revolution will do.
label: D

text:
Authoritarians don’t come to power alone.

They come to power on the backs of men like Kevin McCarthy.

Men too weak to adhere to any principle. Too hungry for power to say or do what’s right. And too cowardly to tell the truth.

We deserve better.
label: D

text:
What does the @GOPLeader call the time when the president of the United States was siding with Putin over his own intel agencies?

When he was withholding military aid from Ukraine to extort political favors?

When he was inciting a mob to attack the Capitol?

The good ol’ days.
label: D

text:
I want to wish all those who celebrate a very Happy Easter!

As we begin our long-awaited return to family gatherings, I hope you and your loved ones enjoy a day of festivity and meaningful reflection together.

Have a wonderful day!
label: D

text:
Tonight, Jews across the country and around the world will gather at the Seder table to begin Passover.

On this holiday, we reflect on the incredible resilience of the Jewish people – and pledge to fight the rising tide of antisemitism Jews face today.

Chag Pesach Sameach!
label: D

text:
Alabama passed a bill criminalizing doctors who treat trans kids.

And this legislation – targeting vulnerable children – isn’t unique.

Right now, 300 anti-LGBTQ+ bills are pending in state legislatures.

The GOP is endangering these kids for political gain.

They have no shame.
label: D

text:
Ghost guns allow dangerous people to buy deadly weapons with no safeguards.

I’m glad @POTUS is issuing new protections to keep us safe and taking action to end gun violence.

Next: Let’s repeal the loophole allowing gun makers and dealers to escape justice and accountability.
label: D

text:
Anti-vaxxers are using breakthrough cases like mine to push dangerous, unscientific lies.

So let me be clear:

I feel fine. I don't need a ventilator. My family isn't worried about whether I'll make it. Because I’m vaccinated.

Vaccines save lives. Please get yours today.
label: D

text:
Earlier this week, I called for Russia to be suspended from the UN Human Rights Council.

And yesterday, they were kicked out.

Russia’s war crimes against the Ukrainian people are horrifying.

The U.S. will continue to hold Russia to account for its violations of human rights.
label: D

text:
Putin's assault on Ukraine grows more brutal by the day.

We're seeing civilians killed by indiscriminate bombing. Cities reduced to rubble. Summary executions. Rape and torture.

We must collect and preserve evidence. And Putin must face justice.

We cannot look away.
label: D

text:
When @POTUS nominated Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, he made a phenomenal choice.

And I'm thrilled such a talented jurist has received bipartisan support to become a Supreme Court justice.

America will be a fairer, more just place with her on the bench.
label: D

text:
Dan Scavino and Peter Navarro possess intimate knowledge of events leading up to Jan 6, yet have chosen to conceal it.

Tonight, Congress voted to hold them in contempt.

Now, the DOJ must submit the matter to a grand jury – because the American people deserve accountability.
label: D

text:
Because of sky-high prices, oil companies are making millions off the war in Ukraine – literally.

While families struggle to pay at the pump. This is unacceptable. 

Enough is enough. Time for a windfall profits tax on the oil industry.
label: D

text:
This evening, I unfortunately tested positive for COVID-19.

I'm feeling fine, and grateful to be vaccinated and boosted. In the coming days, I will quarantine and follow CDC guidelines.

And remember, please get vaccinated!
label: D

text:
I'm glad @POTUS will extend the pause on student loan repayments. It will help so many.

But I think he needs to go further. We've got to ease the burden, not merely delay it.

Let's start by canceling up to $50,000 in debt per borrower.

And let's do it now, Mr. President.
label: D

text:
The good news: We can still stop some of the most catastrophic effects of climate change.

The bad news: We're running out of time. And fast.

We need all hands on deck to pass bold legislation.

Because when it comes to saving the planet, inaction kills.
label: D

text:
My heart breaks for Sacramento as it becomes the latest city traumatized by a horrific act of gun violence.

My prayers are with the victims and their families.

But prayer alone isn’t enough. 

We must put an end to the scourge of gun violence once and for all.
label: D

text:
Last night, millions of Muslims across America and around the globe marked the start of the holy month of Ramadan.

This is such a special time for our Muslim friends and neighbors - a time for prayer, reflection, healing, and renewal.

So to all those observing: Ramadan Mubarak.
label: D

text:
We just passed the MORE Act. It would eliminate criminal penalties for cannabis offenses.

And expunge past federal cannabis convictions – addressing the detrimental impacts of decades of misguided drug policy.

It's time we took a stand for equity in our justice system.
label: D

text:
Jamal Khashoggi was murdered in 2018. And four years later, justice has yet to be done.

Now a Turkish prosecutor is trying to move the trial of his murder suspects to Saudi Arabia – the country whose leader ordered Khashoggi's killing in the first place.

This cannot stand.
label: D

text:
In Canada, insulin is $12 on average.
In Mexico, it's about $16.

Yet in the U.S., it's nearly $100 for the same lifesaving drug.

Same continent. Same drug. Wildly different prices.

Why? Corporate greed.

Today, the House will cap the price of insulin. The Senate must follow.
label: D

text:
Absolutely horrified by the attacks in Israel over the last week.

The people of Israel have a right to live freely, and in peace — these attacks threaten that right.

I’m praying for those who lost loved ones to this horrific violence.

We must not let terror win.
label: D

text:
I’ll give Trump credit for consistency.

Even now, he’s asking Putin for political help.

Despite being impeached for seeking foreign help in an election. 

Despite the fact that Putin is killing Ukrainian civilians.

Trump is consistent.

Consistently selfish — and unpatriotic.
label: D

text:
Don't buy the fear-mongering from Republicans bought and paid for by Big Oil.

The transition to green, renewable energy isn't just good for the planet – it's good for America.

Millions of good-paying jobs. A product made in America, for America. And a brighter future for all.
label: D
D

text:
Judge David Carter issued a remarkable opinion.

Finding the former president may have committed a crime and fraud against the people of the United States.

If no one is above the law, then no one must be above the law.

Congress is doing its part. The DOJ must do the same. https://t.co/cyDlyoD08R
label: D

text:
Our investigation has a singular purpose: To ensure we never again experience a day like Jan 6.

Every witness called before us should cooperate. Yet Peter Navarro and Dan Scavino have refused.

And cited spurious privileges.

Leaving us no choice but to find them in contempt.
label: D

text:
For too long, billionaires have avoided paying their fair share in taxes.

President Biden's billionaire minimum income tax would help fix that.

And go a long way toward making our economy work for everyone.

It's about time everyone paid their fair share, don't you think?
label: D

text:
For millions of Afghan women and girls, education has been a lifeline. One we feared the Taliban would sever.

Our fears were tragically well-founded, as the Taliban has decided to keep girls’ high schools closed indefinitely.

These images are haunting, and heartbreaking. https://t.co/2jPl5vq451
label: D

text:
Deeply disturbed to learn two separate Jewish community centers have received bomb threats this week.

Antisemitism and extremism are on the rise everywhere – including here at home.

So we must remain vigilant. And recommit ourselves to the fight against such destructive hatred.
label: D

text:
Oil companies are more concerned with growing their - already record-high - profits than easing the pain ordinary folks feel at the pump.

It's greed, plain and simple.

Isn’t it time to wean ourselves off fossil fuels and invest in renewables?
label: D

text:
One month ago, Putin launched an unprovoked war on Ukraine. Since then:

The Ukrainian people have held off Russian forces, at the cost of many lives lost.

The U.S. has delivered billions in aid.

And the world has shunned Putin.

Time for Russia to get the hell out of Ukraine.
label: D

text:
The Citizens United decision enabled special interest groups to pour billions into elections and erode public trust.

Today, I'm introducing a constitutional amendment to overturn this disastrous ruling.

Let's get dark money out of our democracy. And return power to the people.
label: D

text:
The US has confirmed what many of us already believed: Members of Russia's armed forces are committing war crimes in Ukraine.

Putin's war will be defined by images of dead children and other civilians.

Innocents slain by indiscriminate violence.

Russia must be held to answer.
label: D

text:
Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson has demonstrated great intellect and a mastery of the law.
 
She was unfazed despite outrageous and offensive Republican attacks.
 
And she has proven herself worthy of serving on the highest court in the land.
label: D

text:
Secretary Albright was one of the fiercest champions of democratic values and human rights in history.

She was a personal friend and visionary. And I am deeply saddened by her passing.

As we mourn, we honor her legacy by pledging to defend democracy at home and abroad.
label: D

text:
As Ukrainians defend themselves against Russian atrocities, the IC has a unique role to play in exposing war crimes.

Strategic declassification ahead of the invasion blunted Russia's attack.

And exposing war crimes now will ensure accountability in the future. https://t.co/7VSHGnYWnq
label: D

text:
The head of the UN said the world is “sleepwalking to climate catastrophe.”

So what on earth are we waiting for?

How bad do the storms and wildfires have to get? How high must the sea level rise?

What’s it going to take before we pass a Green New Deal?
label: D

text:
In making the free press subject to criminal liability for reporting the news, Putin has taken another step to crush free speech in Russia.

He fears the Russian people will learn the truth.

It's dangerous. And wrong.

We must continue to support those who expose Putin’s war.
label: D

text:
Each of your statements are false, Kevin.

But remember when you said Trump was on Putin’s payroll?

And when you said the Benghazi Select Committee was designed to bring down Hillary’s numbers?

Brilliant comments like those cost you dearly.

Glad to see you’re keeping it up! https://t.co/DE7hL09Fe0
label: D

text:
Only Russia can put an end to the suffering and death in Ukraine.

And such an order must come from Putin himself.

Tragically, Putin has proven to be a man comfortable with the blood of women and children on his hands.

Like other war criminals. https://t.co/CUOgjkXnEj
label: D

text:
As we near the end of the pause on student loan repayment, we must take action.

And the President can do it with the signing of a pen.

To extend the pause, yes. But also to cancel at least $50,000 in debt per student.

It's time to act, Mr. President.
label: D

text:
After years in Iran, Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe and Anoosheh Ashoori are home.

But Iran’s continued use of hostages as leverage is horrific.

Iran must free wrongfully-detained Americans, Siamak and Baquer Namazi, Emad Shargi, and Morad Tahbaz.

And all other political prisoners.
label: D

text:
You've probably been feeling the price at the pump a lot lately. I get it.

The prices are too damn high.

There are many reasons for the sky-high prices, and one of the most pernicious: Price gouging. It must end.

I’ll explain why.
label: D

text:
Since 2020, election deniers have forced nonpartisan officials out, installing allies who may overturn future results.

I joined my colleagues in calling on the DOJ to intervene.

Partisans are working to rig the next election.

And I fear they will succeed if we don't step up.
label: D

text:
Horrified that two more journalists were killed by Russian forces in Ukraine.

In times of war as well as peace, we look to the free press for truth.

They take great risks to bring us news. Deadly risks.

Praying for the families of Pierre Zakrzewski and Oleksandra Kuvshynova.
label: D

text:
In the face of Russian terror, the Ukrainian people have shown immense courage.

The images of devastation President Zelenskyy showed to Congress today underscore Putin's depravity.

And remind us all Ukraine is relying on our support.

We can’t let them down.
label: D

text:
We must use every economic tool to drive up the cost of Vladimir Putin's war for Russia – even if some of those actions impact us here at home.

Americans have made it clear: We are willing to make sacrifices in order to live our values.

#sxsw2022 https://t.co/Bsl9pvq5tL
label: D

text:
There is no democracy without a free press.

Brent Renaud’s death at the hands of Russian forces underscores the indiscriminate brutality of Putin.

My prayers are with Renaud’s family - and with journalists in Ukraine & across the globe risking it all to speak truth to power.
label: D

text:
The bomb threats last month against HBCUs are deeply disturbing – which is why I immediately reached out to the FBI.

Yesterday, Congress reaffirmed our unequivocal support for Black colleges and universities, and against hate and bigotry.

We stand with you today, and always.
label: D

text:
Today, the Intelligence Committee held its worldwide threats hearing.

From Russia’s war against Ukraine to China's rising influence to the menace of domestic terrorism, it's clear we face no shortage of challenges.

Good intelligence helps us prepare for whatever comes our way. https://t.co/emyRDfNJet
label: D
D

text:
According to Barr, Trump bore responsibility for January 6.

And cared only about himself, not country or principle.

But Barr would support him again.

Clearly, Barr has more in common with Trump than he would like to believe:

Neither of them care about country or principle.
label: D

text:
I support banning Russian oil and gas sales to the U.S.

Putin may find other buyers for what he’s selling.

But we are putting crippling sanctions on Russia over its brutal invasion of Ukraine.

And I don’t want a single U.S. dollar contributing to his war machine. https://t.co/WLqJSNyveF
label: D

text:
Nine days.
One million refugees.
Thousands injured or killed.
Untold lives disrupted.

The human costs of Putin’s war are staggering.
label: D

text:
Bill Barr misled the country during the investigation into Trump’s Russia misconduct.

Then intervened to protect those who lied to cover up for the former president and themselves.

And weaponized the DOJ against Trump’s enemies.

That’s awful material for a book. Or a legacy.
label: D

text:
Breonna Taylor should be alive today.

But her life was ended by a police officer who shot into her apartment while she slept.

Her death was a needless tragedy.

Made worse by the absence of accountability. 

My prayers are with her family.
label: D

text:
Young people work so hard to pursue education.

Yet too often, food insecurity forces them to choose between staying in school and feeding themselves or their families.

That's why @RepBarragan and I introduced the Food for Thought Act.

We have the power to end student hunger.
label: D

text:
We’re witnessing a GOP assault on LGBTQ+ kids.

In Arkansas, they've banned health care for trans kids.
In Florida, they've demonized LGBTQ+ kids in the classroom.

And now in Texas, they're investigating parents of trans kids as “abusers.”

It’s sick. And plain wrong.
label: D

text:
We've still got a long way to go, and inflation is taking a toll, but our economy has made great progress under President Biden.

Unemployment is down.
Job creation is up.
The economy is booming.

As we put the worst of the pandemic behind us, America is bouncing back.
label: D

text:
America was built by workers and working families.

The hundreds of millions of people who make this country run.

President Biden knows that.

And last night he demonstrated his commitment to rebuilding our economy from the bottom up and middle out.
label: D

text:
Last night, President Biden laid out his plan to end gun violence.

A key part of it? Cracking down on reckless gun dealers and manufacturers by repealing their liability shield.

My Equal Access to Justice for Victims of Gun Violence Act does just that.

Count me in, @POTUS.
label: D

text:
Tonight, against the backdrop of Putin's invasion of Ukraine, President Biden sent an unequivocal message:

America stands with Ukraine – and with democracies around the world.

We will not bend nor break in the face of an authoritarian bully.

There is simply too much at stake.
label: D

text:
Like all of you, I am in awe of the courage of the Ukrainian people, fighting to protect their homeland.

And likewise inspired by the brave Russian protestors risking imprisonment to dissent and speak out against war.

Their courage underscores the depths of Putin's cowardice.
label: D

text:
A new report found climate change is unfolding so rapidly that it may soon become impossible for us to adapt.

This is a five-alarm fire.

We need all hands on deck, taking unprecedented action to fight back.

An Apollo-like project to save us. A Green New Deal.
label: D

text:
My heart is heavy for @SenFeinstein who has lost her husband, Richard.

Richard Blum was a devoted husband, father, and grandfather who touched the lives of many.

I will keep the Feinstein family – and all who loved Richard – in my prayers.

May his memory be a blessing.
label: D

text:
🧵: For many weeks, U.S. Intelligence agencies have warned of the potential for a major Russian invasion of Ukraine.
 
Despite serious efforts at diplomacy, that warning has proven all too accurate.

I want to take a moment to share some thoughts on where we go from here.
label: D

text:
Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson is a brilliant and fair jurist.

Someone who has dedicated her life to public service and making our nation more just.

She is an outstanding and historic choice for the Court, and deserves a strong and bipartisan confirmation.
label: D

text:
In a nation where dissent can be a death sentence, it takes tremendous courage to speak out.
 
To the Russian people protesting against war, against Putin: We see you. We hear you.
 
And we stand with you in calling for an end to this devastating conflict.
label: D

text:
Putin’s invasion of Ukraine is more than just a brutal act of war.

It’s an attack on the idea that countries are free to choose their own destiny.

An attack on the rules-based order that has kept world peace since WWII.

And, most critically, an attack on democracy itself.
label: D

text:
We must enact the most severe sanctions possible.

Go after Russia's biggest banks.
Go after Russia's biggest oligarchs.
Go after Russia's ability to use financial markets.
 
Cut them off from doing business with the West until they end this bloody war.

And we need to do it now. https://t.co/G7QqQGLeNa
label: D

text:
This is Putin's war.
 
Senseless, tragic, and barbaric.

We must enact debilitating sanctions on Russia and cut them off from the global economy.

And, in the meantime, we pray for the Ukrainian people.

And an end to this madness.
label: D

text:
Reports SF Police stored DNA from rape survivors and violent crime victims, even children, are deeply disturbing.

This violates privacy rights and chills reporting of crimes by survivors. I’m pressing for answers on how we end this practice.

Including possible legislation.
label: D

text:
Trump is again cozying up to Putin.

It’s part of an ugly pattern.

He welcomed and used Russian help in his 2016 campaign.

He withheld military aid to Ukraine to get help in his 2020 campaign.

And it won’t be the last time that Trump undermines US security.

If we let him.
label: D

text:
It’s disturbing that SF police may have used DNA from a sexual assault survivor to link her to an unrelated crime.

Survivors show immense courage in coming forward.

We should support them completely – not treat them as suspects.

The FBI must address this abuse of DNA evidence.
label: D

text:
The Biden admin has delivered serious consequences for Russia following its invasion of Ukraine.

But we must be prepared to go further. Because all indications are that Putin won't stop without more punitive measures.

We must meet this challenge head-on and stand with Ukraine.
label: D

text:
Bear with me here, folks:

Back in 2012, Meatball the Bear wandered into Glendale homes to eat IKEA meatballs.

Hank the Tank just wants leftover pizza.

Who doesn’t?

Meatball was taken to a sanctuary. Hank the Tank should be taken to one, too. Anything else would be unbearable. https://t.co/6h2PXmSr45
label: D

text:
Putin’s unilateral declaration that territories within Ukraine are now independent republics is an arrogant and dangerous move by the Kremlin dictator.

The U.S. and our NATO allies are united in our determination to punish this blatant violation of Ukraine’s sovereignty.
label: D

text:
Any diplomatic effort is worthwhile if it can prevent war.

A war in Ukraine would be a humanitarian disaster.

I applaud President Biden for all his efforts to achieve peace.

Standing strong means never closing the door to diplomacy. https://t.co/WhgaBswdQ3
label: D

text:
The DOJ investigated Clinton over her emails. Repeatedly.

Now it’s been confirmed that Trump took classified materials to Mar-a-Lago in violation of law.

It’s one thing for Trump to be breathtakingly hypocritical.

But the DOJ must enforce the law – consistently.
label: D

text:
The past few days indicate our worst fears about Russia’s intentions toward Ukraine may be coming true.

There is still time for Putin to choose diplomacy. He must.

But make no mistake – we will stand united with our NATO allies in response to whatever comes next.
label: D

text:
3.7 million children have fallen back into poverty since Senate Republicans let the Child Tax Credit expire.

3.7 million kids who now have less to eat and more to worry about.
 
Imagine being so interested in scoring political points that you let kids go hungry.

Shameful.
label: D

text:
The settlement between Remington and families of Sandy Hook victims is a win that holds the gun industry to account.

And it underscores the vitality of my Equal Access to Justice for Victims of Gun Violence Act which will help others seek redress.

We must seize this momentum.
label: D

text:
Four years ago, an act of evil stole 17 people from us in Parkland.

Today, we honor the memory of those lost in the Marjory Stoneman Douglas shooting.

And rededicate ourselves to fighting for the gun safety measures that could've saved their lives... and can still save others.
label: D

text:
There were multiple lines of effort to overturn the 2020 election.

The violent attack on January 6 was only the last.

DOJ should investigate any credible allegation of illegality concerning these efforts.

By anyone. Including the former president.
label: D

text:
Congressional staffers put so much effort and energy into serving our country.

And, like every worker, they should be able to organize for better working conditions and a brighter future.

Proud to join @RepAndyLevin's bill to recognize their right to form a union.
label: D

text:
Florida lawmakers just passed a blatantly discriminatory anti-LGBTQ+ bill.

Legislation designed to dehumanize vulnerable LGBTQ+ kids.

And it’s just one piece of a larger campaign of hatred led by GOP politicians.

One we are obligated to speak out against.
label: D

text:
California was right to put a moratorium on the death penalty in 2019. As was Biden in 2021.

And @CAGovernor is right to start closing the nation’s largest death row.

We must continue to reform our criminal justice system.

And California must continue to lead the way.
label: D

text:
We can't accept thoughts and prayers in place of policy on gun violence.

Not when more than 100 are shot and killed every day.

I have a bill to crack down on the gun industry which has gotten away with murder for far too long. Literally.

And I won't rest until it becomes law.
label: D

text:
This is what Republicans call “legitimate political discourse.”
 
Don’t let them rewrite history. https://t.co/2cHSAY3vS9
label: D

text:
Today, House Democrats passed a bill to fix our supply chains, spur American innovation and reaffirm our global leadership.

It's called the America COMPETES Act.

It's good for the economy and jobs.
Good for science and innovation.
And most important — good for working families.
label: D

text:
Very strategic use of intel by the Biden admin to reveal Russian plans to stage an elaborate ruse to justify an invasion of Ukraine.

Likewise for the British regarding Kremlin plans to install a puppet regime. 

Syncing up with our allies on intel, as well as sanctions.

Smart.
label: D

text:
Every worker must have the right to unionize. Full stop.

If congressional staff want to unionize, they’d have my full and total support.

The doors of the labor movement should be open to all.
label: D

text:
If Jeff Bezos can pay to dismantle a bridge in the Netherlands to fit his super yacht…

Then his company should have no trouble paying its fair share in taxes so we can build bridges in America.
label: D

text:
First, Cruz begs forgiveness for saying Jan 6 attackers were terrorists.

Now, Hawley echoes the Kremlin, questioning if Ukraine should be allowed in NATO.

Welcome to Trump’s GOP, where propaganda is policy and Senators grovel at the feet of despots.
label: D

text:
The bomb threats against HBCUs have been deeply traumatic.

I'm glad the FBI will investigate them as racially-motivated violent extremism and potential hate crimes.

We must find those responsible, and put an end to this campaign of terror against the Black community.
label: D

text:
Trump just doubled down, saying he would “absolutely” pardon those responsible for Jan 6.

People who beat police officers. Who wanted to hang his VP.

He called them patriots.

Every day he reminds us of his dangerous unfitness.

When a despot threatens democracy, believe him.
label: D

text:
In February, we celebrate the rich history, culture, and contributions of Black Americans.

But we must also reflect on the injustices Black Americans have faced throughout our history.

And pledge ourselves to the work of dismantling the many inequities that persist today.
label: D

text:
The bomb threats against HBCUs are deeply disturbing.

Today, @RepAndreCarson and I requested a briefing from the FBI to ensure steps are being taken to apprehend the culprits.

We must do all that we can to combat the scourge of white supremacist violence and terrorism.
label: D

text:
What an incredible game between the @RamsNFL and @49ers. Not that we expected anything less after these playoffs. If it couldn’t be my Raiders, then it should have been one of you. 

Let’s go Rams!
label: D

text:
The 1/6 Committee is examining how the insurrection took place and why. 

To ensure our democracy never again comes so close to the brink. 

Trump’s offer to pardon those responsible shows we’re still at risk.

And suggests his only regret about Jan 6 is that it did not succeed.
label: D

text:
On Holocaust Remembrance Day, we remember the six million Jews and millions other individuals murdered by the Nazis.
 
Let us use this day to honor their lives.
 
And to pledge ourselves to work against the evil, hatred, and antisemitism behind that atrocity.
 
Never again.
label: D

text:
The Supreme Court’s ruling in Roe v. Wade protected the right to choose 49 years ago.

Or so we thought.

Today, the right to choose is threatened like never before.

But we won't - and can’t - sit idly by as Republicans attempt to reverse reproductive freedoms.
label: D

text:
Twelve years ago, the Supreme Court’s Citizens United decision removed critical limits on corporate campaign spending.

Allowing dark money to pour into our elections.

I have a constitutional amendment to overturn that disastrous ruling.

It's time to return power to the people.

text:

When it comes to reproductive choice, this Court has prioritized politics over precedent.

And their gravely misplaced priorities are a danger to all.
label: D

text:
Some Senators defend the filibuster as a means of encouraging bipartisanship.

Are they kidding?

It’s use hasn’t prevented partisanship — only made it worse. 

It’s a vehicle for minority rule, nothing more.

And Senators who can’t recognize that, need to get out of the way.

text:
When you think of the genius of our democracy, what comes to mind?
 
I’m willing to bet it’s not the filibuster.
 
No, it’s the right of the people to choose their representatives. The right to vote.
 
A right under attack - a right we must protect by abolishing the filibuster.

text:

text:

text:

The filibuster must die so that democracy can live.
